 2011-10312011-09-29,  ,  ,  ,  CIC
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of MARC GOBEIL of Toronto, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour until June 28, 2012, or until the day prior to the coming into force of the Balanced Refugee Reform Act, whichever is earlier.
